Name: Splat Cat
About the game: Play as an artist in this puzzle platforming game, painting their way through their discovery of art, and the creative block that lies within the medium. As the game progresses, you dive deeper and deeper into your insecurities, doubts, and fears as an artist, and begin to encounter different types of monsters while trying to reach your goal. Finally, defeat the personification of these insecurities about your art in an epic boss battle before revealing the beautiful artwork you made along the way.
